statements: SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_question, survey_response FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id = 100;
SELECT survey_id, survey_question, survey_response FROM survey_data WHERE survey_response = 'Yes';
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id = 50 ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT survey_question FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id = 20 GROUP BY survey_question;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1
SELECT survey_id, survey_question FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id = 10 ORDER BY survey_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT survey_question FROM survey_data WHERE survey_response LIKE 'Yes%'
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) as total_responses FROM survey_data GROUP BY survey_id HAVING total_responses > 5
SELECT survey_id, survey_question, survey_response FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_question FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_answer = 'Yes';
SELECT * FROM ExternalDataset WHERE dataset_id = 5;
SELECT dataset_name, external_data FROM ExternalDataset WHERE dataset_id = 3;
SELECT survey_id, survey_question, survey_answer FROM SurveyData;
SELECT * FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_id = 1
SELECT survey_id, survey_question FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_answer = 'Yes'
SELECT * FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_question LIKE '%customer%' ORDER BY survey_id DESC
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4
SELECT * FROM ExternalDataset WHERE dataset_name = 'Sales'
SELECT survey_id, survey_question, respondent_name, response_value FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT respondent_name, response_value, survey_question, survey_id FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM external_dataset WHERE dataset_id > 5;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_description FROM external_dataset WHERE dataset_id = 3;
SELECT survey_id, dataset_id, survey_question, dataset_name FROM merged_data WHERE survey_question LIKE '%customer%';
SELECT * FROM survey_data
SELECT survey_question, respondent_name, response_value FROM survey_data
SELECT survey_id, respondent_name, response_value FROM survey_data ORDER BY respondent_name DESC
SELECT * FROM merged_data WHERE survey_id = 10 AND dataset_id = 5
SELECT survey_question, dataset_name, response_value FROM merged_data WHERE dataset_name LIKE '%sample%'
SELECT * FROM SurveyData;
SELECT survey_title, survey_date FROM SurveyData;
SELECT survey_title, survey_date FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SurveyData ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_title, dataset_name FROM SurveyData JOIN ExternalDataset ON SurveyData.survey_id = ExternalDataset.dataset_id;
SELECT * FROM SurveyData;
SELECT survey_title, survey_date FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT dataset_name FROM ExternalDataset ORDER BY dataset_name DESC;
SELECT response_id, respondent_name FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT s.survey_id, sd.survey_title, r.response_text FROM SurveyData sd JOIN SurveyResponses r ON sd.survey_id = r.survey_id JOIN MergedData m ON sd.survey_id = m.survey_id WHERE m.dataset_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SurveyData ORDER BY survey_name DESC, respondent_id ASC
SELECT question_id, SUM(1) AS response_count FROM SurveyResponses GROUP BY question_id HAVING response_count > 5
SELECT DISTINCT survey_name FROM SurveyData
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE question_type = 'Multiple Choice'
SELECT respondent_id, COUNT(*) AS response_count FROM SurveyResponses GROUP BY respondent_id ORDER BY response_count DESC
SELECT * FROM SurveyData WHERE respondent_id = 123 ORDER BY id DESC, survey_name ASC
SELECT answer FROM SurveyAnalytics WHERE survey_id = 456 AND respondent_id = 789 AND question_id = 1
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE question_type = 'multiple choice' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10
SELECT data_value FROM ExternalData WHERE data_type = 'category' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT survey_name, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM SurveyData JOIN SurveyResponses ON SurveyData.respondent_id = SurveyResponses.respondent_id GROUP BY survey_name HAVING total_responses > 100
